RECRUITMENT BRIEF FOR INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS DEVELOP MENT MANAGER – DATA 
ACQUISITION (IBDM -DAQ)  
 
Company Background  and Context  
 
Founded in the early 1950’s, Grant Instruments is a world leader in the des ign and manufacture of 
equipment for sample  preparation, scientific analysis, data acquisition and data analysis, providing 
solutions to the global  scientific and industrial markets.  For more information please browse our 
web site www.grant.co.uk . 
 
Employing around 85 people across a wide range of job functions and disciplines, Grant is an 
independent, privately -owned company and has established a worldwide reputation for high quality, 
reliable and robust systems . Strictly Confidential. June2010  
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL  
 
 
 
GRANT INSTRUMENTS  
 
RECRUITMENT BRIEF FOR INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS DEVELOP MENT MANAGER – DATA 
ACQUISITION (IBDM -DAQ)  
 
Company Background  and Context  
 
Founded in the early 1950’s, Grant Instruments is a world leader in the des ign and manufacture of 
equipment for sample  preparation, scientific analysis, data acquisition and data analysis, providing 
solutions to the global  scientific and industrial markets.  For more information please browse our 
web site www.grant.co.uk . 
 
Employing around 85 people across a wide range of job functions and disciplines, Grant is an 
independent, privately -owned company and has established a worldwide reputation for high quality, 
reliable and robust systems .      
 
Grant is structured as a system with a defined and measured end to end flow focussed on delivering 
what matters to our customers.  The company and its core and supporting processes have a clear 
and well understood purpose.  The most important measures u sed within Grant Instruments are 
leading capability measures which are used to demonstrate the predictability of performance 
against purpose and to enable the organisation to monitor and improve its systems.  Principles 
define the correct behaviours that d eliver what matters to our customers.  
 
The purpose of Grant Instruments is:  
“To provide products and services that enable sample preparation and measurements ”  
The operational purpose of Grant Instruments is:  
“To deliver what matters to our customers , impr ove efficiency and increase revenue and profits ”  
 
 
 
Strictly Confidential. June2010  
 Company System Picture – what we do at Grant Instruments  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Recruitment of IBDM – DAQ  
This is a new position and the  job description  below  covers the main duties.  In addition to a ctively 
managing the current data acquisition  (DAQ) products international distributors, a key initial focus 
would be on setting up the international distribution network for an innovative  new wireless / 
internet based DAQ product line . The specific initial application identified is within the World wide 
medical refrigeration  market . This new role would also be responsible for the product management 
aspe cts of the DAQ product Roadmap i.e. identifying new market opportunities, enhancing and 
developing existing ones, whilst considering hardware and software developments.  
 
This role should appeal to  candidates who have some proven experience in identifying and 
establishing distribution networks  for industrial or medical instrumentation, prefera bly in Export 
Markets, and who wish to move to a growing company, where their personal contribution can be 
clearly identified.  Clearly, experience or expertise directly from within the data acquisition arena 
would be a significant advantage.

Strictly Confidential. June2010  
 In May 2009 we acquired the assets and intellectual property of California -based Accsense, Inc ., a 
company that designs remote monitoring systems using self healing wireless mesh network 
technology. The acquisition of Accsense Inc.’s remote monitoring technology, desi gns and hardware 
has bolstered our successful data acquisition product portfolio. To date we have continued to sell 
the Accsence products solely in the USA, through our  existing  DAQ Distributor. Manufacturing of the 
Accsense range has been transferred to our ISO9001 -certified facility near Cambridge.  
 
Our plan  for 2010/11  is to introduce the Accsense range into Europe and the rest of the world to 
respond to the increasing demand for wireless sensor solutions that are quick to deploy, easy -to-use 
and requir e no software installation or complex configuration.  This product has great potential and 
complements our existing data acquisition range and will provide us with an opportunity to ta
